resources.string: The definition of private... in some way.
PornAOSP (or PAOSP) is an Android distribution focused around privacy when doing... ermmmm... certain activities.
PornAOSP is designed with simplicity and ease of use in mind. Based on LineageOS, it brings the finest stability and greatest features to the user.

Focused on improving what we see as the greatest features of Android and not sophisticating things, PornAOSP provides a smooth user experience with many intuitive customization options to satisfy your tinkering needs.
What? Porn? An OS? How is it even possible?
Looks fake, huh? Let me show you how wrong you are. It is actually being developed.
We created a Telegram group to share or project to the world, which grew to 250 members within a few hours. It also managed to run through a few of spam attacks, but that is a story for another day.

After some time we considered the issue of the PornHub trademark. We managed to release one build with PornHubOS name, but later ones will be branded PornAOSP. We strongly believe that name is much more neutral. We dont wish to risk a copyright abuse. However, the final name could change.
Based on Android Nougat and Oreo
Pornograph - an audio player based on Phonograph
LegitBrowser - a browser automatically cleaning sensitive history
Have you ported our ROM to your device? Do you want it to appear on this site?
And yes, we know it is not the best release browser ever. We will fix it one day.
Want to build it for your device? Here are the sources!
Want to build it for your device? Here are the sources!

-We dont know! Here, in Poland, there is no way to check it, because there is no carrier who would provide VoLTE in normal conditions. It mostly depends on if it is working in official Lineage builds.
When you will release a build for my phone?
-When someone from the devs manages to build and release it. If you are too excited to wait, build it yourself!
